pageContext.claim: “This year alone, we have successfully lowered your health insurance premiums in the state of Tennessee by 26 percent.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is cherry-picking the 26 percent figure, as it looks only at one plan on the Tennessee health care exchange. Health care costs in Tennessee are projected to go down 12.4 percent on average in 2019. Plus, rates would have dropped more had the individual mandate stayed in place.
